alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:47PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 530 PM MST... At 447 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arizona City, or 14 miles south of Casa Grande, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, La Palma, Arizola, Toltec and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 194 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 159 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 125 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County
